definitions.definition: A covering, usually a bandage, for the eyes, blocking light to the eyes.
definitions.example: I put a blindfold over my boyfriend's eyes and told him I had a surprise for him.

definitions.definition: Something that obscures vision (literally or metaphorically).
To cover the eyes, in order to make someone unable to see.
Having the eyes covered so as to obscure vision
With the eyes covered so as to obscure vision
